name: Unstable Way Home
description:
Rodrigues is drunk. Really drunk. He should go home, but it’s a long and challenging way.

Can you help Rodrigues find his unstable way home to his girlfriend?

How to play
  • WASD - Move
  • P - Riot to scare of people
  • K - Kick stuff around (even people)
  • O - Drink Coffee (it helps with unstable walking)
Team
  • Emil (limered) - Programming
  • Michi (ryupold) - Special Effects, Graphics
  • Hätty (Haetthead) - Programming
  • Helen - Graphics
  • Sven (justsWn) - Sound

Software

  • Some graphic programs
  • Rider
